review.comment: I don’t know how the whole process of working for you was so easily explained and understood,  from coming in to detailed design selection process even the most important the installation,  unique Wrought Iron are an excellent family business that know how to work so well with one another, the installers were also very precise clean and quick, 10/10 would recommend to anyone who compliments the door.

What a great product and company, found that the staff were all very professional and helpful.
Had a cellar door designed and installed at home everyone loves the result and i could not be happier.

Great Product and Best Customer service experience.
From the moment we arrived at the showroom we were impressed with  the knowledge and products displayed. Now that we had had the entrance doors installed it has added grand dear to our home.
A truly beautiful and quality product.
We highly recommend this company as to its professional dealings with us,from sales to installation.
Thanks Leanness and Robert.

SUPER EFFICIENT SERVICE FROM THE GET GO! LEANNA IN THE SHOWROOM WAS PATIENT, INFORMATIVE AND PROFESSIONAL. THE TEAM OF BROTHERS WHO CAME OUT WERE PUNCTUAL, EFFICIENT AND CLEANED UP AFTER THEMSELVES. THE DOOR LOOKS AMAZING. LOVE IT!

Dishonest.  Had to put 'non-refundable' deposit down.  Then they refused to supply as per description in their quote - saying the contract didn't allow for the part of the balustrade that goes along the stairs, even though they were given full set of house plans.  Hello?  They are 'consultants'...
Demanded another $8K!! Or they keep the deposit?!
Dodgy.  BTW, their stuff is made in China, not in AU as they make you think.  Worst consumer experience.  Also, NSW fair trading say they aren't licensed.
'Unique Wrought Iron' are definitely unique - unique in one of the worst consumer experiences had.

DECEPTIVE QUOTE GIVEN, BEWARE OF THEIR CONTRACT DETAILS.  THEY FAILED AND REFUSEDTO DELIVER GOODS AS DESCRIBED IN QUOTE, AND NSW FAIR TRADING ADVISE THAT THIS COMPANY IS NOT LICENSED IN NSW TO DO RESIDENTIAL WORK.
Total disappointment.
One star given because negatives cant.

We are just glad that we found this company.
From the sales team to the high quality of the product to the very speedy and professional installation everything was just as promised! We are thrilled to bits after looking for an entrance door for quite some time ! The product speaks for itself!

32 years ago, when I built our house I promised my wife gates! Over the intervening years I have investigated various wrought iron manufacturers and for the most part they have been far too expensive. I was fortunate to discover Unique Wrought Iron and they have built us the most elegant set of gates. The design people are fantastic, the workmanship superb, the installation very well done & the price most competitive. I would like to say thank you to all the staff, particularly Leanna & Kevin for a job well done!

Unique Wrought Iron at Punchbowl are a quality business.  From a very informative website to a well stocked showroom, helpful customer service, reasonable prices (for what you actually get!) and after the expected three month build wait, professional and neat installation services.  We are absolutely thrilled with our new entry door and have nothing but praise for the people from UWI who were helpful throughout the process.  In comparison with a new timber door with inferior styling and door furniture and locks extra, the price for these wrought iron doors  represents excellent value.  Highly recommended.
Unique Wrought Iron supplied install installed doors on our new house and we are so happy with the results. An Outstanding company with great service. I highly recommend
